医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明年轻男性的体重指数与部位特异性肿瘤之间存在线性关联年轻男性体重指数（BMI）与新发部位特异性肿瘤之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Study-shows-linear-associations- Between-body-mass-index-and-site-specific-tumors-in-young-males.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Study-shows-linear-associations- Between-body-mass-index-and-site-specific-tumors-in-young-males.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0303ecd-f4c2-4ae9-a1b0-9d45a6266a20 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 06:52:00 -0500 Study shows linear associations between body mass index and site-specific tumors in young males
研究发现饮食和久坐行为会影响肥胖儿童的肥胖身体活动、久坐行为和饮食质量之间的关系https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Diet-and-sedentary-behavior-influence-adiposity-in-obese-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Diet-and-sedentary-behavior-influence-adiposity-in-obese-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36764e78-0926-4574-a2cb-20073862caed Wed, 08 Nov 2023 06:17:00 -0500 Diet and sedentary behavior influence adiposity in obese children, study finds
美国将为美国老年人提供艾滋病毒预防药物，以阻止病毒传播一项拟议的联邦政策旨在通过提供免费预防药物来保护美国老年人免于感染艾滋病毒，这是赶上欧洲和非洲大部分地区遏制病毒传播的最新举措。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/US-to-cover-HIV-prevention-drugs-for-older-Americans-to-stem-spread-of-the-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/US-to-cover-HIV-prevention-drugs-for-older-Americans-to-stem-spread-of-the-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d99d1d5-47aa-4daa-9b7e-1d080ea787e0 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 05:44:45 -0500 US to cover HIV prevention drugs for older Americans to stem spread of the virus
创新的人工智能模型利用 YouTube 视频博客及早识别抑郁症迹象一种创新的抑郁症检测模型，利用 YouTube 视频博客的视听功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Innovative-AI-model-uses-YouTube-vlogs-to-identify-depression-signs-early.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Innovative-AI-model-uses-YouTube-vlogs-to-identify-depression-signs-early.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24c61e5b-50ef-4429-b538-96bcf3c9993f Wed, 08 Nov 2023 05:43:00 -0500 Innovative AI model uses YouTube vlogs to identify depression signs early
素食对运动表现的影响素食和杂食饮食对运动表现的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/The-effect-of-vegetarian-diets-on-sports-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/The-effect-of-vegetarian-diets-on-sports-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f2fd89a-0f92-42ec-83bd-e68920f1ce55 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 05:07:00 -0500 The effect of vegetarian diets on sports performance
药物基因组学有望实现个性化痴呆治疗基于药物基因组学的痴呆个性化治疗研究https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Pharmacogenomics-holds-promise-for-personalized-dementia-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Pharmacogenomics-holds-promise-for-personalized-dementia-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=137a4b2a-81a1-48a2-a936-8c8ff53229f1 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 04:31:00 -0500 Pharmacogenomics holds promise for personalized dementia therapies
个人偏见扭曲了 COVID-19 记忆，对未来的流行病政策构成挑战在一系列研究中，研究人员发现个人偏见会显着影响个人对 COVID-19 大流行的记忆，这可能会影响历史叙述并影响未来的大流行政策。他们认为，认识到这些偏见对于制定维持社会信任和凝聚力的长期战略至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Personal-biases-warp-COVID-19-memories-pose-a-challenge-for-future-pandemic-policies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Personal-biases-warp-COVID-19-memories-pose-a-challenge-for-future-pandemic-policies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a97f567c-964a-4089-89d2-4110c57f4679 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 23:34:00 -0500 Personal biases warp COVID-19 memories, posing a challenge for future pandemic policies
青少年主导的研究揭示了普遍存在的电子烟文化并寻求干预途径在加拿大的一项研究中，青少年研究人员让他们的同龄人参与焦点小组，探索青少年电子烟的现实，揭示使用和获取方面令人不安的趋势，同时也确定有效的反电子烟干预措施的潜在策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Teen-led-study-sheds-light-on-the-pervasive-vaping-culture-and-seeks-paths-for-intervention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Teen-led-study-sheds-light-on-the-pervasive-vaping-culture-and-seeks-paths-for-intervention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5d75888-c36c-41e0-9fba-c8e87df97f96 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 23:07:00 -0500 Teen-led study sheds light on the pervasive vaping culture and seeks paths for intervention
免疫印记：COVID-19 增强剂针对新变种的有效性减弱的症结所在《自然微生物学》中的这项研究回顾了免疫印记的概念及其对 SARS-CoV-2 抗体反应的影响，强调了针对新出现的变种的 COVID-19 加强疫苗接种功效面临的挑战。研究人员认为，了解免疫印记对于开发能够引发广泛而持久的免疫保护的疫苗至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Immune-imprinting-The-crux-of-waning-COVID-19-booster-effectness-against-new-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Immune-imprinting-The-crux-of-waning-COVID-19-booster-effectness-against-new-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de1edf01-03af-4554-a454-a2be37a67a09 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 22:47:00 -0500 Immune imprinting: The crux of waning COVID-19 booster effectiveness against new variants
CAR-T 细胞疗法可以持续抑制难治性狼疮患者的自身抗体美国风湿病学会年会 ACR Convergence 2023 上的新研究表明，CAR-T 细胞疗法可以持续抑制难治性狼疮中的自身抗体，同时保持对疫苗的强劲反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/CAR-T-cell-therapy-could-lead-to-sutain-suppression-of-autoantibodies-in-treatment-pressive-lupus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/CAR-T-cell-therapy-could-lead-to-sutain-suppression-of-autoantibodies-in-treatment-pressive-lupus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a87edb4d-f795-4c87-926d-64eef5638697 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 22:41:24 -0500 CAR-T cell therapy could lead to sustained suppression of autoantibodies in treatment-resistant lupus
